title: SMARTReporter 3.1.17 – Hard drive pre-failure warning utility
content: SMARTReporter is an application that can warn you of some hard disk drive failures before they actually happen! It does so by periodically polling the S.M.A.R.T. status of your hard disk drive. S.M.A.R.T. (Self-Monitoring Analysis and Reporting Technology) is a technology built into most modern hard disk drives that acts as an “early warning system” […]

title: BricsCAD 18.2.27.1 – Building Information Modeling and Mechanical Design
content: BricsCAD is a software application for computer-aided design. It is the all-in-one solution for 2D, 3D, Mechanical Design and Building Information Modeling. Based on industry-standard DWG, BricsCAD brings a modern yet familiar approach to design on macOS. title: Origami 2.8.1 – 3D folding plug-in for Illustrator CS6 or later

title: Cyberduck 6.8.2 – FTP and SFTP browser
content: Cyberduck is a robust FTP/FTP-TLS/SFTP browser for the Mac whose lack of visual clutter and cleverly intuitive features make it easy to use. Support for external editors and system technologies such as Spotlight, Bonjour, Keychain, and AppleScript are built-in.   Cyberduck is an Open Source product licensed under the GPL and free to use.
